metadata.title: CVE-2021-3753 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A race problem was seen in the vt_k_ioctl in drivers/tty/vt/vt_ioctl.c inthe Linux kernel, which may cause an out of bounds read in vt as the writeaccess to vc_mode is not protected by lock-in vt_ioctl (KDSETMDE). Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.2.0-20.20
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.2.0-20.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.2.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.2.0-1004.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.2.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1003.3
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1003.3
No subscription required
